name: Annual Business Survey aggregate R&D estimates, by questionnaire reference and employment size, for companies with 1–9 employees: 2018
description: Annual Business Survey aggregate R&D estimates, by questionnaire reference and employment size, for companies with 1–9 employees: 2018

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed or funded R&D.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, 2019 Annual Business Survey: Data Year 2018.
